subTitle: akclifto Lab 5 REST API with Node Express

calls.description: Directs to the api documentation page.
Retrieves the api documentation information from a json file in resource folder.
Handles the USD to Euro conversion and returns JSON response to client.
Handles the USD to Pound conversion and returns JSON response to client.
Removes the last item from activity history for the currency conversion calculator.
Resets the activity history for the currency conversion calculator.
Retrieves the activity history persisted on the server and returns to client in JSON response.
